import React, { useState } from "react"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Table from "react-bootstrap/Table"; export default function AddMacro() { const [description, setDescription] = useState("") const handleChange = e => { setDescription(e.target.value); } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(description); } return (
Name Calories Protein Carbs Fat
) }
